column5: Trying to put together a fly in trip for next year. Looking for 1-3 mid age guys ( I am 57) from the Toronto area who would be interested in going to Leuenbergers on Kag Lake next June. Cost around $2000 for all inclusive week. Was there in 2010, Walleye, Pike, Brookies and Lakers, great fishing, Walleyes average 3 lbs!!! Please reply if you have any interest. Thanks. Here is a link to Leuenbergers.http://www.leuenberger.ca/kag.htm
been to the keg 5 times awesome time you will love it
